sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RHONE one of the largeſt rivers in France, which, riling among the Alps of Switzerland, paſſes through the lake of Geneva, viſits that city, and then runs ſouth-weſt to Lyons ; where, joining the river Soane, it continues its courſe due ſouth, paſſing by Orange, Avignon, and Arles, and falls into the Mediterranean a little above Marſeilles.
